review: I don’t know if the buttons on the remote are too sensitive or if the buttons are raised too high (as opposed to concave), or what the problem is.  But if I drop it from 18” off the coffee table, I end up having to Search and spell out the Search for Titles all over again, select whatever movie I’m watching and fast forward, or start from the Menu depending on what button was hit in the fall.  It’s a hassle but I pre-ordered it for approx $39 and it’s worth it since I have Amazon Prime.An upcoming app for YouTube was announced so that will add to the features I like.
